boss.name: Chaos Blade
boss.description: You must ascend a +10 Katana and the soul of Quelaag.

boss.name: Crystal Ring Shield
boss.description: Ascend a +10 shield or buckler, and the soul of The Moonlight Butterfly. Practically any shield can be used given that it's been upgraded to +10.

boss.name: Darkmoon Bow
boss.description: Ascend any +10 Bow, and the soul of Gwyndolin.

boss.name: Dragon Bone Fist
boss.description: Ascend any +10 Cestus or Claw, and the core of the Iron Golem.

boss.name: Dragonslayer Spear
boss.description: Ascend any +10 Spear or Rapier, and the soul of Ornstein.

boss.name: Golem Axe
boss.description: Ascend any +10 Axe, and the core of the Iron Golem.

boss.name: Great Lord Greatsword
boss.description: Ascend a +10 dagger, sword or greatsword, and the soul of Gwyn, The Lord of Cinder (can only be done on NG+).

boss.name: Greatshield of Artorias
boss.description: Ascend a +10 shield or buckler and the soul of Sif, The Great Grey Wolf.

boss.name: Greatsword of Artorias (Cursed)
boss.description: You must Ascend a +10 Dagger, Sword or Greatsword, with the soul of Sif, The Great Gray Wolf. Using these weapons for ascension will give you the cursed version of the Greatsword of Artorias. The name will not indicate any difference between the true and cursed variant, but the cursed version has a stat requirement of 18 for Faith and Intelligence.

boss.name: Greatsword of Artorias (True)
boss.description: You must ascend a +10 Broken sword, and the soul of Sif, The Great Gray Wolf. Basic Zombies or the Defiled in Blighttown will usually drop broken swords. The name will not indicate it is the true version of the greatsword, but it has higher stat requirements of 20 for faith and intelligence.

boss.name: Lifehunt Scythe
boss.description: Ascend any +10 Halberd, Scythe or Whip, and the soul of Priscilla. Unlike other Boss Souls, Priscilla's soul only ascends one weapon.

boss.name: Moonlight Butterfly Horn
boss.description: Ascend any +10 Spear or Rapier, and the soul of the Moonlight Butterfly.

boss.name: Quelaag's Furysword
boss.description: Ascend a +10 Curved Sword, and the soul of Quelaag. A scimatar is a good choice.

boss.name: Smough's Hammer
boss.description: Ascend a +10 Hammer or Great Hammer and the soul of Smough.

boss.name: Tin Darkmoon Catalyst
boss.description: Ascend any Catalyst and the soul of Gwyndolin, The Darkmoon God. Ascension of the original catalyst is not needed, as it cannot be done. The sorcerer's catalyst is the best choice for ascension.

drop.name: Black Knight Greataxe
drop.description: Random drop from Axe-wielding Black knights.

drop.name: Black Knight Greatsword
drop.description: Random drop from Greatsword-wielding Black Knights.

drop.name: Black Knight Halberd
drop.description: Random drop from Halberd-wielding Black Knights.

drop.name: Black Knight Shield
drop.description: Random drop from any Black Knight.

drop.name: Black Knight Sword
drop.description: Random drop from any Sword-Wielding Black Knight.

drop.name: Channeler's Trident
drop.description: Rare random drop from Channelers. Three respawning channelers can be found in The Duke's Archives.

drop.name: Crest Shield
drop.description: Found in the Undead Asylum (revisited). Acquired as drop from the now hollow Oscar who first gave you the Estus Flask.

drop.name: Crescent Axe
drop.description: Acquired by killing Patches, or it can be purchased from him when he moves to Firelink Shrine.

drop.name: Demon's Spear (maybe?)
drop.description: Rare Random drop from the Bat Wing Demons in Anor Londo (whilst sunlit). Can also be purchased from Shiva of the East in Blighttown, if you are a member of the Forest Hunter's Covenant.

drop.name: Giant's Halberd
drop.description: Rare random drop from the giant gold knights in Anor Londo (whilst sunlit). It can more easily be purchased from the Giant Blacksmith for 5000 souls.

drop.name: Grant
drop.description: Acquired by killing NPC invader Paladin Leeroy. He will invade you in The Tomb of Giants just before Nito's domain, down near the area that overlooks the distant Ash Lake.

drop.name: Sanctus
drop.description: Acquired by killing NPC invader Paladin Leeroy. He will invade you in The Tomb of Giants just before Nito's domain, down near the area that overlooks the distant Ash Lake.

drop.name: Silver Knight Shield
drop.description: Anor Londo. Random drop from any Silver Knight.

drop.name: Silver Knight Spear
drop.description: Anor Londo. Random drop from Spear-wielding Silver Knights.

drop.name: Silver Knight Straight Sword
drop.description: Anor Londo.Random drop from Sword-wielding Silver Knights.

drop.name: Stone Greatshield
drop.description: Darkroot Garden. Random drop from the Stone Knights.

drop.name: Stone Greatsword
drop.description: Darkroot Garden. Rare random drop from the Stone Knights. Can more easily be purchased from Shiva of the East, if you are a member of the Forest Covenant.

covenants.name: Dark Hand
covenants.description: Given as a gift when joining Darkwraith Covenant. (Can also be obtained as a drop from the NPC Darkwraiths in New Londo Ruins)

covenants.name: Gravelord Sword
covenants.description: Given as a gift when joining Gravelord Servant Covenant.

tails.name: Dragon King Greataxe
tails.description: The Depths. Cut off the tail of the Gaping Dragon.

tails.name: Dragon Greatsword
tails.description: Cut the tail off of the Ancient Dragon in Ash Lake. As long as you don't attack the body, this will not anger the dragon or break the covenant.

tails.name: Drake Sword
tails.description: Undead Burg. Use arrows to shoot the tail of the Red Drake, or Bridge Wyvern, from underneath the bridge. It can also be cut off from on top of the bridge, if the Bridge Wyvern has landed to attack you.

tails.name: Moonlight Greatsword
tails.description: Crystal Cave. Cut off the tail of Seath The Scaleless, once the immortality crystal has been broken. (Seath's tail cannot be cut off in your first encounter)

tails.name: Priscilla's Dagger
tails.description: Painted World of Ariamis. Cut off the tail of Priscilla - this can be difficult to do considering her ability to turn invisible, so consider careful strikes or weak weapons. Tag her with a throwing knife so you can track her while invisible. use weak weapons or the Force spell to break her poise, then go for her

tails.name: Gargoyle Tail Axe
tails.description: Undead Parish. During the boss fight, cut off the tail of the first Bell Gargoyle. Easier if focused down before 2nd Gargoyle comes into the fight. It can also be obtained from the two gargoyles near the beginning of Anor Londo.
